name: Santiago De Cuba
description: Welcome to Santiago - the second largest city in Cuba. Here under the hot sun, among the hum, brisk traders shouts and cargo vessels whistles, you can fully realize your economic and strategic abilities. Attend local people, monitor key buildings, buy all tradable goods - fruit, sugar, rum, tobacco, cigars and load them in the holds. Become the best you can be in constantly shifting preferences conditions, leave your rivals behind and gain the victory!
